name: shy
greetingText: Finally the day has come ... you are 22 baby üòéü•∏
wishText: HAPPY BIRTHDAY SHAIBU,BUBU,SHY ;) (many more names to come..)
textInChatBox: What should i write/how should i say happy bday...
text2: I've thought of countless ways to make this special, but none seemed quite enough to express how much you mean to me.
text4: I realised,I wanted to do something
wishHeading: HAPPY BIRTHDAY SHAIBU,BUBU,SHY ;) (PS:many more names to come..)
outroText: Happy Birthday! üéâ Main bohot grateful hoon ki hum us trip pe mile. Lagta hai jaise destiny thi. While we may not always sail the same course, I truly cherish every moment we spend together.LOVE YOUü§ç
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
